A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Expectations were lofty for this film and I did expect some disappointments but ... what Isaw was just terrible. It's fine for a director to take things in another direction but the entire film is a betrayal to what I have always loved about Star Wars. I feel like the entire movie was written to pander to the liberal media that would be responsible for the reviews and to that end I guess it was a triumph but I left the cinema truly depressed. Don't think I'll even go to the next one\, it's not even Star Wars anymore to me.
